review:
We visited Dr. Basavaraj for male infertility issues in October. At first, we found him very measured with his words and giving less time to a consultation.  Later we understood he is cautious, practical and scientific in his approach with treatment ie he wants to gather all the facts before suggesting a course of action.

At every step of the way, he explained to us the odds of success very candidly, which my husband and I appreciated. 

** *** *** ********* *** *********** ***** ** ************ His understanding of issues plaguing fertility is deep and reasoned. I never felt the need for a second or third opinion around him.

There was a time when we were nervous about embryo transfer, and he brought our faith up with his kind words “Don’t worry ma, itll be alright” :) ..

Thanks to his intervention, we conceived in 4-5 months end-to-end with our first try at IVf. 

The nurses and staff at his clinic are super well- trained at handling scans, injections, retrievals and transfers.  

A good doctor handling your case can impact your life’s outcomes, and Dr. Basavaraj sure did change ours for the better.

We are immensely thankful to him. We would recommend people facing the same issues to visit him without any hesitation.

Minor areas of improvement: 1) His clinic does have a big wait time, so pls be prepared for that and keep time with you handy when you go in. 

Since it is a life changing treatment, I did not view this negatively, but for some it can be frustrating. 

2) sometimes I felt our conversations can be more two-way than one way. For e.g. on precautions on exercise, I had a diff POV but not much time to express it…

We consulted Dr. Basavaraj at Vishvas clinic on our infertility problem for 9 years. We just met him based on the feedbacks which I read on the Internet. Dr Initially gave us the details of the treatment which are their, He explained IVF with ICSI process and cost involved in a very detailed manner and cleared all our queries. We started taking injections from Day 2 until Day 10 and he monitored the follicle growth periodically. He did all the scans and egg retrieval procedure himself. Successfully egg retrieval was done and fertilization happened and we got 6 embryos developed to blastocyst stage. As my hormone level is high, doctor suggested doing the embryo transfer after a month to avoid any complications.  While all these were in Process. He never gave us the false promises he usually answers to the point, he always checked on the conditions how I was responding and tried to build the confidence in us. This Confidence which he gave us brought the Belief within in us that sure we would have the success in the next cycle of the transfer. 
And now I am 10 wks pregnant which was a dream and Hope always when I had attend the other Fertility clinics where they cheated us with false treatment and false promises. Unlike other clinics This place does not talk about hope. This Place really boost you with the Belief. They rightly have the tag line BELIEVING IS EVERYTHING!!  as only when you Believe You can do it and He will help you to achieve your Dream. This Doctor is the one who will first make your self believe that you can do and he gets this done!!  I have seen there is Never NO… or IMPOSSIBLE word in his Clinic and It is always YES we can do it!!
He is having a very good team of nurses; He always gives you positive energy. We are lucky to get treated by him. I would definitely suggest people suffering with Infertility to consult him and be patience with the treatment process and protocols and you will succeed for sure.

Our Sincere thanks for Dr. Basavaraj *** *** *** ****** *** *** ****  Thank you for all the guidance and support till date. Wish You and your Family Always Be Happy!!

review:
I wanted to write this review for a long time. My journey for fertility treatment began around 2 years back. I first met dr. Basavaraj after reading lots of positive reviews on internet and also one of my friends gave good feedback about him. I never met any other doctor for fertility treatment before. During my first visit itself I felt very comfortable to talk to him openly and enquired about all possible options available. The best thing I liked about him throughout this journey was his temperament and a positive attitude. He has a very cool temperament that he easily maintains inspite of his hectic work pressure. He never suggested unnecessary tests and medications. After few tests, he suggested ICSI. I still remember his reassuring words after I almost gave up. He said this process needs only one good sperm and not many. So he said that you don't need to worry when someone has less or poor sperm count . Those reassuring words turned to be very powerful and true towards the end for me. When the actual procedure was done, only one embryo survived out of 18 and that's because only one sperm turned out to be of good quality. His words turned out to be golden words for me and I became thankful to this great doctor forever as I have a cute son on my lap today. He turned 1 year. He has already started walking and speaking 😊 My life has become much more beautiful after the arrival of my son and I have a new meaning for this life. No money could compensate for the changes he brought in my life. Thank you very much doctor. Long live Dr. Basavaraj and long live your service.

People generally talk about waiting time, but I would say that his treatments are life changing events and waiting time for this doctor is just worth it.

We had been visiting the doctor regularly for more than three months. He is been regularly monitoring the fetus/my pregnancy since the first day as we are under his medication. After six weeks of pregnancy there was sudden and heavy bleeding for nearly two weeks. ***** ****  ***** *** *** ******* ******** ** ** *** ****** **** ********* 
During these 8 weeks I have undergone several USGs( internal scans) but we were not told of any reason for my miscarriage till now. 
*** ** *** ********** **** ****** **** ******* **** ** ****** *** *** ****** *** ******** ***** *** 

The doctor is friendly and handles the patient sensitively but is not listening to the patient attentively. He is always in a hurry. 

After 2 weeks of severe bleeding , I had severe pain and had to undergo D&C. *** * ** ****** *** **** ******* ****** **** ******** *** ***** ********* ** *************
